introduction.subTitle: Build your business presence into Facebook community easily and quickly!
introduction.proPoints:
- No credit card required 
- Easy setup 
- Cancel anytime
introduction.resume: Make your first steps with PrestaShop Facebook!
introduction.proPoint1Description:
Control your ad settings and business tools 
from one place.
introduction.proPoint2Description: Choose the account where you store ad payment information for your business.
introduction.proPoint3Description: Use data from Facebook Pixel* to understand actions people take on your website.
introduction.proPoint4Description:
Manage your product catalog and 
unlock the power of ads.
introduction.proPoint5Description:
Help people find your products on Instagram 
and Facebook.

messages.syncCatalogAdvice: One more thing: Match your categories and import your product catalog to set up Facebook Shop, Instagram Shopping and create ad campaigns.
messages.unknownOnboardingError: An unknown error occurred during onboarding process. Please reload and try again.

notConnected.description: With Facebook Business Manager, Facebook Page, Facebook Ads account, Facebook Pixel, Instagram Business account and products, you’ll be able to:
notConnected.details:
- Create catalog 
- Sync your catalog automatically and in real time 
- Create Shop on Facebook Page & Instagram Shopping 
- Add Messenger plugin in your shop 
- Customize your Facebook Page with call-to-action

connected.description: You authorize this Facebook account to connect to your store:

glass.text: You don’t see Facebook secured browser? We help you relaunch the window to finish configuration. You may need to activate popup windows in your browser to continue.

catalogSummary.categoryMatchingIntro:
Match your own categories with official Facebook categories. 
It helps get better ad performance and activate shop plugins.
catalogSummary.catalogExportWarning: Only products from matched categories are synced.
catalogSummary.catalogExportIntro: To sell and advertise your products on Facebook and Instagram, you need to export your product catalog.
catalogSummary.reportingIntro: Only products from matched categories are synced.

categoryMatching.intro: Match your own categories with official Facebook categories to improve catalog quality and ad performance.

autocomplete.tooManyResults: Too many results, please complete your search.
autocomplete.fetchError: An error occurred during search process.
